Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Dermaseptin-PS1 (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: skin, the waxy monkey tree frog,Phyllomedusa sauvagei, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 96.8% similarity toDermaseptin-S8. GRAVY: 0.50; Mol Wt:  3164.796; Mol formula: C143H244N39O39S1; Mol Ex Coeff: 5550.Structure: Helical in 50% TFE.Activity: Active against S. aureus (MIC 10 uM), E. coli (MIC 10 uM) and C. albicans (MIC 100 uM).MOA:cancer: Anticancer (U-251 MG): apoptosis. Updated Jan2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Long Q, Li L, Wang H, Li M, Wang L, Zhou M, Su Q, Chen T, Wu Y.2018
Literature Information.Title: Novel peptide dermaseptin-PS1 exhibits anticancer activity via induction of intrinsic apoptosis signalling
